To be added once the server supports this functionality

Parameters:

storeUser

public void storeUser(User user)
Stores a user record in the local database. This should be called after this user was authenticated succesfully with the server

Parameters:
user - Object with the username, password, and URI for the account

                        Task task)
Sends a request to the web server to refresh this task data

Parameters:
user -

saveTaskForUser

public void saveTaskForUser(User user,
                            Task task)
This non-blocking method will create/edit a task on the web server, and if succesul it will also create/edit the task record on the local database. Upon completion it will execute the onAddTask callback with the result.

Parameters:
user - Object containing the authentication credentials
task - Object containing the task details to be saved

deleteTaskForUser

public void deleteTaskForUser(User user,
                              Task task)
This non-blocking method will delete a task on the web server, and if succesul it will also delete the task record on the local database. Upon completion it will execute the onRemoveTask callback with the result.

Parameters:
user - Object containing the authentication credentials
task - Object containing the URI of the task to be deleted

getTaskListByUser

public void getTaskListByUser(User user,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> tagList)
Gets all tasks belonging to the given user
